chapters.title: Chapter 2:  Strangers
chapters.info: al'Lan Mandragoran, p. 20—Guest in Emond's Field the day before Bel Tine. He is quite tall, has long hair that is graying at the temples and is held from his face by a narrow leather headband. His face is all stony planes and angles, weathered but unlined. He is Moiraine's Warder. See also Andra; Damodred, Moiraine; Mandragoran, Akir; ti Mandragoran, Leanna.
